__comment__: JSON file specifying the image to use for a given type/name and resolution. Read in by cartopy.mpl.geoaxes.read_user_background_images.

pop.__comment__: Population density from Nasa earth observations website

BlueMarble.__comment__: Blue Marble Next Generation, Aug 2004, 0.1 degrees

BlueMarbleBright.__comment__: Blue Marble Next Generation, Aug 2004, 0.1 degrees

NaturalEarthRelief.__comment__: Natural Earth I with shaded Relief, water, and drainage

GrayEarth.__comment__: Gray Earth with shaded relief, hypsography and ocean bottom, high res

black.__comment__: Population density from Nasa earth observations website
